title: Which skills will be in demand in the next 10 years, and where can I learn them online during these locked at home days? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the next coming years…The most demanding skills like cybersecurity , AL (Artificial Intelligence ) and ML(Machine learning), and experience in few popular programming languages like pyhton and Java.You can learn from youtube, java tutorial points , geeksforgeeks and w3schools. FOR certification you can choose online platforms like Udemy, Anylatic Vidhya and Coursera. Hope this will be helpful for you. Keep exploring. Keep updating your skills. ALL THE BEST!
